ygData.subject: Re: word of possession(happy99)
ygData.msgSnippet: If you look at the E-Mail carefully I am stating that you have nothing to fear from E-Mail sent viruses IF you do not download the attachment. I said nothing
ygData.messageBody:
If you look at the E-Mail carefully I am stating that you
have nothing to fear from E-Mail sent viruses IF you do not
download the attachment.

I said nothing about the people knowing all about viruses.

I just don't want everyone to run screaming from this
message list cause they are afraid that their harddrive will
explode. Most people in fact know very little about viruses.

I was attempting to calm the fears that some people have
about viruses...especially ones sent by E-Mail. Just look
at how many people believed in the Good Times virus.

And it did not exist.
